thread.title: Good value with the breakfast included
thread.title_full: Good value with the breakfast included - Review of Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Strikkelund
title: Good value with the breakfast included
text: The rooms are small and a bit worn down, but clean and comfortable. The bathroom worked, but it would have been nice with a shelf. The beds were okay, and the internet in the room was really good. Travelling with two teenage boys the free breakfast was worh every penny.
